contextId.information: The words "fourth" and "eleventh" are the ordinal forms of "four" and "eleven." You may need to make explicit the event from which the writer counts the years. AT: "the fourth year after Solomon became king ... the eleventh year after Solomon became king" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: the fourth year ... the eleventh year

contextId.information: The word "eighth" is the ordinal form of "8." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
